name: NEON (itch)
description:
NEON is an arcade-style 2D top-down shooter inspired by Geometry Wars.

This is still in development, so things will change.

How To Play:
- Use WASD / Arrow Keys to move
- Use the mouse to aim
- Left click (LMB) to fire

System Requirements:
- 90MB free Memory on drive
- 200MB RAM
- barely any usage on CPU and slightly higher on GPU.
